pageContext.claim: “Daniel Henninger of The Wall Street Journal: “This IG Report makes it clear, as did Rod Rosenstein’s memo, that Trump was absolutely justified, unquestionably justified, in firing Jim Comey. So I think the Mueller Investigation is on pretty weak grounds right now.” Witch Hunt!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has given several conflicting reasons why he fired former FBI director James Comey. The IG report found fault with Comey's actions in the lead-up to the 2016 election but also found no bias in the FBI's decisions. It's not clear how the IG report shows special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation to be "on weak grounds," since the IG report did not focus on his probe.
